name: Running out of Space
description:
Running out of Space

Hi, This game was made for Ludum dare 42. the theme was Running out of space so I took the theme and turned into a game.

R.o.o.s. is a top-down shooter with a twist, which is whenever you fire the space your on will shrink and a random planet will appear which will act as a barrier for your movement or any kind of a blast.

CONTROLS

W-A-S-D to walk around , Left-click to shoot or proceed text, Right-click to skip the text. Press R to Restart, Press Q to return the Main menu and while in Menu press S to Switch between songs.

If the normal difficulty is too hard, you can change it in the options. The easy difficulty will affect enemies quantity, boss hp and removes planet spawn.

You need to carefully adjust yourself or you might trap yourself in an empty space.

Aim for the wormholes to create a new space and be careful to not get too close to the other creatures especially ?!?!?

Right now there is only 5 levels, and the last one is a boss battle. i will implement a small story. and currently %50 of it complete and in the game.

R.o.o.s. was made entirely in game maker studio by me, all of the sprites & background was still made in GMS.
SFX was created using bfxr, there are five soundtracks in-game(none of them made or owned by me) : 

  • Dance with the dead - Eyes of Madness
  • Xurious - DeathToTraitors
  • OVERWERK - Toccata
  • Dance with the dead - Poison
  • Magic sword - Battlefield

please give your thoughts and suggestions about the game, thank you for playing.
